channel.title: 508-525 Spawn/PVP Server (Source + Client) REQ
channel.description: Hey Mopar, I am looking for a 508-525 spawn server. I have looked around for quite awhile and non of them are suitable. I really admired the Varrock West Bank pking. I am looking for one with a good combat base, and charging for spawned items. I used to play them quite a bit but I just can't find them anymore.
